title: Eco-chic Retreat in Vietnam
description: Turn on your "out of office" and escape to pure beaches, pristine waters and a world of private infinity pools, as you journey to Vietnam for this ultimate one-of-a-kind retreat. Experience the luxury of Six Senses Con Dao, the first five-star resort in Vietnam's tropical archipelago, with daily breakfasts, two-course lunch or dinner for two, 60 minutes of spa treatments and a nightly cocktail.
offer_address: Dat Doc Site  Con Dao District

title: Vietnam Con Dao Six Senses Indulgence with Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
Savour signature Six Senses luxury in Con Dao's breathtaking protected parklands. With rooms laid out to resemble a traditional Vietnamese village, the location is spectacularly appointed on Dat Doc Beach, a one-mile stretch of private beachfront.

Savour authentic, locally sourced food from across the archipelago at two onsite restaurants, rejuvenate your senses at the holistic Six Senses Spa, sip East-meets-West tipples at two bars and explore the island's rich history and diverse marine life.
offer_address: Dat Doc Beach, Con Dao, Ba Ria - Vung Tau 74000, Vietnam
